EPISODE 441: Cult Recruitment: Why Smart, Spiritual People Join | Matthew Remski

Cult recruitment leverages situational vulnerability and the deep human need for community. In this episode, Matthew Remski breaks down the mechanics of high-demand groups and why charismatic leaders use spiritual bypassing to silence dissent. We explore the intersection of conspirituality, personal trauma, and how to maintain critical discernment in a confusing spiritual landscape.
